predicate.note: Frames file for 'ham' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: fixed phrase: ham it up
example.text: But it is the Trinity Rep newcomer, Jonathan Fried (Zamislov, the paralegal) who is the actor to watch, whether he is hamming it up while conducting the chamber musicians or seducing his neighbor's wife (Becca Lish) by licking her bosom.
